items.title: Democratic lawmaker sues to remove Trump's name from Kennedy Center
items.description: Rep Joyce Beatty, who sits on the centre's board, argues the name change is illegal because it requires approval from Congress.

items.title: Brazil ex-President Jair Bolsonaro's surgery for hernia 'successful'
items.description: The former leader is serving a 27-year sentence for plotting a coup after losing the 2022 presidential election.

items.title: Watch: Pope Leo's plea for peace in Christmas message
items.description: Pope Leo calls for an end to conflicts around the world in Christmas speech.

items.title: Pope Leo urges 'courage' to end Ukraine war in first Christmas address
items.description: The pope also laments the condition of Palestinians during his address to worshippers at the Vatican.

items.title: Waterskiing Santas and giant cuts of meat: Christmas around the world
items.description: From London to Bethlehem, services and festivities to mark the holiday cheer are in full swing.
